pages.text: Cyrtoceras is an early nautiloid that lived from the Ordovician until the Devonian. Its shell resembled a semi curved orthocone shell, showing early stages of the transition from straight shells to swirl shells.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg
